definition: Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/Japanese variant of 魔羯座
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
sheep/goat/CL:頭|头[tou2],隻|只[zhi1]
surname Yang
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: The Fire signs is Aries, Leo and Sagittarius.
sentences.chinese: 火相星座有山羊座，獅子座和射手座。

sentences.english: Eric: Don't ever try to convince him. Capricorns are rebellious.
sentences.chinese: 不要嘗試說服他，山羊座是很反叛的。
